faq.q: How can I know if my store is actually profitable?
faq.a: Escalafy calculates real profit using true sales and true costs, including COGS, shipping, MP fees, cuotas, ads, and fixed expenses.

faq.q: Why is my Meta ROAS different from my real ROAS?
faq.a: Meta over-attributes conversions. Escalafy uses real orders to compute true ROAS after all real costs.

faq.q: How do MP fees and cuotas affect margin?
faq.a: MP charges fees and delayed payouts that significantly change your real margin. Escalafy models them automatically.
